data.label: 网易云信
data.description: 网易云信致力于互联网络技术的开发与研究，使开发者通过简单集成客户端 SDK 和云端开放 API，快速实现强大的移动互联网 IM 和音视频功能。

data.label: NetEase Cloud Letter
data.description: NetEase Cloud Communication is dedicated to the development and research of internet technology, enabling developers to quickly implement powerful mobile internet IM and audio-video functions through simple integration of client SDK and cloud open API.
